programme.title: Carter's civil defence policy
programme.short_synopsis: Carter changes tack on civil defence.
programme.medium_synopsis: President Carter backtracks on civil defence. Debate over US policy on USSR.
programme.long_synopsis:
President Carter backtracks on civil defence. Debate over US policy on USSR.

This archive edition of Letter from America was recorded by one of two listeners, who between them taped and labelled over 650 Letter From America programmes from 1973 to 1989. It was restored by the BBC in 2014.
